text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Billing Console Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates in the Billing Console.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Billing Console Error Rates>
We continue to investigate intermittent availability and increased error rates in the Billing Console.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Billing Console Error Rates>
We continue to investigate intermittent availability and increased error rates in the Billing Console and are working towards resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Billing Console Error Rates>
We have identified the cause of the intermittent availability issues and increased error rates in the Billing Console and continue working towards resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Billing Console Error Rates>
Between 2:06 AM and 5:00 AM PDT we experienced intermittent availability issues and increased error rates in the Billing Console. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
